data.lyric:
[ti:Antisocial]
[ar:Ed Sheeran/Travis Scott]
[al:No.6 Collaborations Project]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Antisocial - Ed Sheeran (艾德·希兰)/Travis Scott
[00:02.14]All you cool people you better leave now
[00:03.95]Coz it's about to happen
[00:20.01]Friday night and I'm riding solo
[00:23.13]When I touchdown keep in on the low low
[00:26.49]I don't mess with your energy
[00:30.62]No photos
[00:32.06]So antisocial but I don't care
[00:35.28]Don't give a d**n I'm gonna smoke here
[00:38.85]Got a bottle in my hand bring more though
[00:42.09]My hat low don't talk to me
[00:44.17]I've been down give me some space
[00:47.22]You don't know what's in my brain
[00:50.33]Music loud easing my pain
[00:54.87]Yeah yeah yeah yeah
[00:56.45]Don't touch me don't touch me
[00:57.56]Don't touch me I came to vibe yeah
[00:59.56]On something on something
[01:00.54]On something I wanna riot
[01:02.69]Don't touch me don't touch me
[01:03.85]Don't touch me I came to vibe yeah
[01:05.97]Won't let nothing come in between me and the night
[01:08.84]Don't touch me don't touch me
[01:10.14]Don't touch me I came to vibe yeah
[01:12.16]On something on something
[01:13.25]On something I wanna riot
[01:15.23]Don't touch me don't touch me
[01:16.50]Don't touch me I came to vibe yeah
[01:18.51]Won't let nothing come in between me and the night
[01:21.22]I need I need I need I need I need I need I need
[01:24.45]I need room I need room
[01:25.83]Where you're standing way too close
[01:27.37]You might catch fumes might catch fumes
[01:29.01]When I zoom when I zoom
[01:30.74]Pass out wake up by myself right past noon right past noon
[01:33.86]And I'm doomed
[01:35.73]Occupied and moving dolo
[01:39.08]Hennessy's drowning all of my issues
[01:41.41]Right before I leave she gives me more than just a 'miss you'
[01:44.19]Yeah
[01:44.46]That thing got more back just like my engine I can hit it
[01:47.42]In the bag
[01:47.99]Seen a vision in the boy then we committed
[01:50.55]It's lit
[01:51.02]I've been lost out inner space
[01:53.59]You left me right in my place
[01:56.73]I put you down on my name
[02:01.17]Yeah yeah yeah yeah
[02:02.62]Don't touch me don't touch me
[02:03.81]Don't touch me I came to vibe yeah
[02:05.88]On something on something
[02:06.98]On something I wanna riot
[02:09.04]Don't touch me don't touch me
[02:10.20]Don't touch me I came to vibe yeah
[02:12.22]Won't let nothing come in between me and the night
[02:15.13]Don't touch me don't touch me
[02:16.45]Don't touch me I came to vibe yeah
[02:18.53]On something on something
[02:19.56]On something I wanna riot
[02:21.60]Don't touch me don't touch me
[02:22.76]Don't touch me I came to vibe yeah
[02:24.79]Won't let nothing come in between me and the night
[02:29.56]Don't touch me yeah
data.trans:
[ti:Antisocial]
[ar:Ed Sheeran/Travis Scott]
[al:No.6 Collaborations Project]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:02.14]各位朋友 赶紧出发吧 
[00:03.95]好戏即将开始
[00:20.01]周五晚上 我一个人
[00:23.13]当我到达时 保持低调
[00:26.49]我不跟你们瞎闹
[00:30.62]不拍照
[00:32.06]如此不合群 但我不在乎
[00:35.28]什么都不管 我就在这里抽烟
[00:38.85]手里拿着酒瓶 给我再来点
[00:42.09]我把帽子戴得很低 不要和我说话
[00:44.17]我很忧伤 给我点私人空间
[00:47.22]你不知道我在想什么
[00:50.33]响亮的音乐缓解我的痛苦
[00:54.87]//
[00:56.45]不要碰我 不要碰我
[00:57.56]不要碰我 我是来解忧的
[00:59.56]有点兴奋 有点兴奋
[01:00.54]有点兴奋 我想大闹一场
[01:02.69]不要碰我 不要碰我
[01:03.85]不要碰我 我是来解忧的
[01:05.97]不会让任何人破坏我今晚的兴致
[01:08.84]不要碰我 不要碰我
[01:10.14]不要碰我 我是来解忧的
[01:12.16]有点兴奋 有点兴奋
[01:13.25]有点兴奋 我想大闹一场
[01:15.23]不要碰我 不要碰我
[01:16.50]不要碰我 我是来解忧的
[01:18.51]不会让任何人破坏我今晚的兴致
[01:21.22]我需要 我需要 我需要 我需要 我需要 我需要 我需要
[01:24.45]我需要空间 我需要空间
[01:25.83]你站得太近了
[01:27.37]你可能会染上烟味 可能会染上烟味
[01:29.01]当我兴奋时 当我兴奋时
[01:30.74]昏厥过去 中午才孤零零地醒过来
[01:33.86]我在劫难逃
[01:35.73]忙忙碌碌 独自一人
[01:39.08]美酒浇灭我的一切忧愁
[01:41.41]就在我离开之前 她让我感受到了特别的温暖
[01:44.19]//
[01:44.46]那件事情还有很多细节 我却已经想不起来
[01:47.42]烂醉如泥
[01:47.99]好像出现了一种预感 接着我们就许下了诺言
[01:50.55]太酷了
[01:51.02]我迷失在了自己的潜意识中
[01:53.59]你离我而去 留我一个人在这里
[01:56.73]我把你铭记在心里
[02:01.17]//
[02:02.62]不要碰我 不要碰我
[02:03.81]不要碰我 我是来解忧的
[02:05.88]有点兴奋 有点兴奋
[02:06.98]有点兴奋 我想大闹一场
[02:09.04]不要碰我 不要碰我
[02:10.20]不要碰我 我是来解忧的
[02:12.22]不会让任何人破坏我今晚的兴致
[02:15.13]不要碰我 不要碰我
[02:16.45]不要碰我 我是来解忧的
[02:18.53]有点兴奋 有点兴奋
[02:19.56]有点兴奋 我想大闹一场
[02:21.60]不要碰我 不要碰我
[02:22.76]不要碰我 我是来解忧的
[02:24.79]不会让任何人破坏我今晚的兴致
[02:29.56]不要碰我
